mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SYSTEM_TASK ( ID, AREA_NAME, STORE_NAME, START_SITE_ID, END_SITE_ID, IN_MARK, MATTER_TYPE, MATTER_NAME, AMOUNT, REQUEST_TIME, TASK_ID, COMPANY_ID, DELETED, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_BY, IS_FINISHED ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startSiteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{endSiteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{inMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{matterType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{requestTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isFinished,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_SYSTEM_TASK.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE SYSTEM_TASK
AREA_NAME = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_NAME = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_SITE_ID = #{startSiteId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
END_SITE_ID = #{endSiteId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IN_MARK = #{inMark,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MATTER_TYPE = #{matterType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MATTER_NAME = #{matterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REQUEST_TIME = #{requestTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TASK_ID = #{taskId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_FINISHED = #{isFinished,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql: SELECT ID id, AREA_NAME areaName, STORE_NAME storeName, START_SITE_ID startSiteId, END_SITE_ID endSiteId, IN_MARK inMark, MATTER_TYPE matterType, MATTER_NAME matterName, AMOUNT amount, REQUEST_TIME requestTime, TASK_ID taskId, COMPANY_ID companyId, DELETED deleted, CREATE_TIME createTime, MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, CREATE_BY createBy, MODIFY_BY modifyBy, IS_FINISHED isFinished
